p: In terms of age groups, people aged between 21 and 40 years old are in a more vulnerable position regarding their mental health status and alcohol consumptions than other age groups. Although fatality rate is higher among older people (14.8 % for 80+ years old, 8% for 70–79 years old, and 3.6 % for 60–69 years old) than young age group (.2%) (Worldometer, 2020, February 29) but, later age group is in more risk of psychological maladjustment. Study suggested that young people can easily trigger stress as they tend to collect information from social media ( Cheng et al., 2014).
